content: What result is expected if we do contains with empty collection?

From: https://hl7.org/fhirpath/2018Sep/index.html#in-membership

If the left-hand side of the operator is empty, the result is empty

What is the rationale for not returning false in this case? Then the implementation could rely on the fact that this operator always returns a Boolean (or throws an error), rather than having to also cover the case where it returns an empty collection.
you could ask that about any operation.
Ok, I will attempt to wrap my head around that
